property.name: mesos.hdfs.data.dir
property.description: The primary data directory in HDFS

property.name: mesos.hdfs.secondary.data.dir
property.description: The secondary data directory in HDFS

property.name: mesos.hdfs.native-hadoop-binaries
property.description: Mark true if you have hadoop pre-installed on your host machines (otherwise it will be distributed by the scheduler)

property.name: mesos.hdfs.framework.mnt.path
property.description: Mount location (if mesos.hdfs.native-hadoop-binaries is marked false)

property.name: mesos.hdfs.state.zk
property.description: Comma-separated hostname-port pairs of zookeeper node locations for HDFS framework state information

property.name: mesos.master.uri
property.description: Zookeeper entry for mesos master location

property.name: mesos.hdfs.zkfc.ha.zookeeper.quorum
property.description: Comma-separated list of zookeeper hostname-port pairs for HDFS HA features

property.name: mesos.hdfs.framework.name
property.description: Your Mesos framework name and cluster name when accessing files (hdfs://YOUR_NAME)

property.name: mesos.hdfs.mesosdns
property.description: Whether to use Mesos DNS for service discovery within HDFS

property.name: mesos.hdfs.mesosdns.domain
property.description: Root domain name of Mesos DNS (usually 'mesos')

property.name: mesos.hdfs.journalnode.count
property.description: Number of journal nodes (must be odd)
